column2: Slightly lethargic and ungroomed; sac'd for tumor size and poor health concerns; T1--between ears, midline; T2--directly posterior to T2 between scapulas, midline
DCT-TVA; Braf ca; ink/arf f/f; pten f/f
Slightly lethargic and ungroomed; sac'd for tumor size and poor health concerns; T1--between ears, midline; T2--directly posterior to T2 between scapulas, midline
Very large section of tumor tissue invading chest cavity and covering lungs (retained with lung tissue).
Lungs appeared very small and undiscernable other than color.
Brain and skull were in tact.
T1-3 cryogenics and 1 cell line attempted; T2-2 cryogenics and 1 cell line attempted.
